r.s: Driver based class to calculate holidays.
r.d: Date_Holidays helps you calculating the dates and titles of holidays and other special celebrations. The calculation is driver-based so it is easy to add new drivers that calculate a country's holidays. The methods of the class can be used to get a holiday's date and title in various languages.
r.n: - Switched from using INI files for translation to XML files - Added script to convert INI files to XML files - Added script to compile XML based language files - Holidays can now have various properties (see "languagefile-with-properties.xml" in examples-directory) - removed "againstNoiseDay" !BC break! from Germany driver, cannot be calculated automatically - new driver-methods: = addCompiledTranslationFile(), allows adding compiled language-data files for performance improvements = getHolidaysForDatespan(), returns holidays within a given time span - several bugfixes - Added filters for german federal states (contributed by Mark Wiesemann)
